subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry made five of 11 3-point shots to help Golden State take a 2-0 series advantage over Houston, which was led by James Harden’s 38 points.
snippet: Stephen Curry made five of 11 3-point shots to help Golden State take a 2-0 series advantage over Houston, which was led by James Harden’s 38 points.
